system.availability: Upgrades Creature of Size Scrawny or smaller to Cyber Creature. They gain Machine(2) Trait. +2 Wounds, Lose Primitive on natural attacks, +5 Strength and Toughness, -5 Agility. They may be further Upgraded. If Cyber Creature fails a Willpower Test by 4+ DoF, or takes a Critical hit to the head, 50% chance to go into a Frenzy until destroyed. Cyber Familiars can usually use gear and weapons has humans can.
system.cost: Does not include costs of creature for Cyber Creature Upgrade and any equipment or abilities that are also implanted.
